<span style = "color:purple">Key Questions</span>

- Does GPA deflation exist at Berkeley?

- If so, which deparments have the highest GPA deflation?

- Is there a difference between Fall and Spring semester GPAs?

- Which departments have the highest GPA?

- Which departments have the lowest GPA?
